Text:
Thanks for all your uploads...

I'm seeking books by renowned futurist Dan Burrus... particularly "Flash Foresight"

Also seeking books By David Cay Johnston...

"The Fine Print - How Big Companies Use "Plain English" to Rob You Blind"

and

Free Lunch - How the Wealthiest Americans Enrich Themselves at Government Expense (and Stick You with the Bill)"

Johnston's book "Perfectly Legal" can be found in your torrent ""Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 19" here:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7470054/Criticism_of_the_Western_Civilization_-_Collection_19_%28Failed_De
